    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    BetCommand
    BET AMOUNT= or RAISE AMOUNT=
    Card
    Represents a standard playing card in a 52-card deck.
    ClientGameState
    Represents the mutable state of the client-side game.
    ClientHandler
    Handles the interaction with a single connected client.
    Command
    Abstract base class for all commands sent from the Client to the Server.
    Command.CommandType
    Enumerates all supported protocol operations.
    ConnectionValidator
    Provides security validation for incoming network traffic.
    ConsoleUI
    Handles the Text User Interface (TUI) for the Poker Client.
    CreateCommand
    CREATE ANTE= BET= LIMIT=FIXED
    Dealer
    Manages deck operations: shuffling, dealing, and card exchange.
    Deck
    Represents a standard 52-card deck.
    DrawCommand
    DRAW CARDS=invalid input: '<'i,j,k> Indexes 0..4 to exchange (max 3)
    EmptyDeckException
    Thrown by the Game Engine when the
    invalid reference 
    com.dnikitin.poker.common.model.game.Deck
    runs out of cards.
    FiveCardDrawFactory
     
    GameConfig
     
    GameEvent
    Represents the finite set of events that can occur within the Poker game logic.
    GameEvent.CardsDealt
    Triggered when cards are distributed to a player.
    GameEvent.GameFinished
    Triggered at the end of a hand when a winner is determined.
    GameEvent.GameStarted
    Triggered when the game transitions from the Lobby phase to active gameplay.
    GameEvent.PlayerAction
    Triggered when a player performs a visible action (e.g., Bet, Fold).
    GameEvent.PlayerJoined
    Triggered when a new player successfully sits at the table.
    GameEvent.RoundInfo
    Triggered to update public table information (Pot size, etc.).
    GameEvent.StateChanged
    Triggered when the game phase changes (e.g., from BETTING to DRAW).
    GameEvent.TurnChanged
    Triggered when the active turn passes to another player.
    GameFactory
     
    GameManager
    A central registry for managing the lifecycle of all active game tables on the server.
    GameObserver
    Defines the contract for components that wish to listen to game state changes.
    GameState
    Represents the lifecycle of a single Poker Hand (Round).
    HandEvaluator
     
    HandRank
    Represents the hierarchy of Poker hands, from weakest to strongest.
    HandResult
     
    HelloCommand
    HELLO VERSION=
    IllegalDrawException
    Thrown when a player attempts an invalid card draw operation.
    IllegalPlayerAmountException
     
    InvalidMoveException
     
    JoinCommand
    JOIN GAME= NAME=
    NoFiveCardsException
     
    NotEnoughChipsException
     
    OutOfTurnException
    Thrown when a player attempts to make a move when it is not their turn.
    Player
    Represents the mutable state of a participant in the game session.
    PlayerStatus
    Represents the current status of a player in a poker hand.
    PokerClient
    Main entry point for the Poker Client application.
    PokerGameException
     
    PokerSecurityException
    Thrown when a client attempts an action that violates security policies.
    PokerServer
    The core TCP server implementation for the Poker game.
    PotManager
    Handles the logic for chip accumulation and distribution, including complex Side Pot scenarios.
    PotManager.Pot
    Inner class representing a single bucket of chips and the players eligible to win it.
    ProtocolEncoder
    Transforms internal GameEvent objects into text-based protocol messages intended for the client.
    ProtocolException
    Thrown when an incoming message fails structural validation.
    ProtocolParser
    Responsible for parsing raw text-based network messages into typed Command objects.
    Rank
    Represents the rank (face value) of a playing card.
    RateLimiter
    Rate limiter to prevent spam and DOS attacks.
    Round
    Tracks the state of a specific betting round (e.g., the first betting round).
    ServerApp
    Entry point for the Poker Server application.
    ServerMessage
    A structured representation of a message received from the Server.
    ServerMessage.Type
    Enum defining all known message types sent by the server.
    ServerMessageParser
    Parsers text messages received FROM the Server (Client-side parser).
    SimpleCommand
    Represents simple commands without additional parameters.
    StandardFiveCardHandEvaluator
    Implements the standard ranking rules for Five-Card Draw Poker.
    StateMismatchException
    Thrown when an action is attempted in an invalid game state.
    Suit
    Represents the four standard playing card suits.
    Table
    The central engine of a single Poker game instance.
    TimeoutManager
    Manages timeouts for player actions.
    TimeoutManager.TimeoutCallback
     
    TurnOrder
    Encapsulates the logic for circular turn rotation.
    WrongGameStateException
     
    WrongRankException
